end.reference: Only finalize once the latest iteration snapshot has been emitted.

xml-engineering.guideline: Freeze schema versions referenced in iteration.xml to guarantee reproducible archives.
Emit a completion checksum so downstream validators can confirm integrity.
Record termination metadata (author, timestamp, reason) for auditing transforms.

closure.step: Merge all iteration outputs into a consolidated document.
Run final schema and checksum validation before publication.
Persist the final XML bundle and notify dependent systems.
